affect ( "first_sniper", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "0" );

	task ( "first_sniper_patrol1" )
	{
		set ( "SET_GOAL", "Guard" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "tower1a" );
		set ( "SET_NAVGOAL3", "tower1c" );
	}

	dowait ( "first_sniper_patrol1" );
}
